Bash(API_URL="http://localhost:4000" EMAIL="james.miller@huronhome.ca" PASSWORD="password123" bash -c '
echo ""üîê Logging in...""
TOKEN=$(curl -s -X POST ""$API_URL/api/v1/auth/login"" \
  -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" \
  -d ""{\""email\"":\""$EMAIL\"",\""password\"":\""$PASSWORD\""}"" | jq -r "".token"")

echo ""‚úÖ Login successful""
echo """"

echo ""üìã Step 1: Get current office children""
curl -s -X GET ""$API_URL/api/v1/entity/type/office"" \
  -H ""Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN"" | jq ""{code, child_entity_codes}""
echo """"

echo ""‚ûï Step 2: Add employee to office children""
curl -s -X PUT ""$API_URL/api/v1/entity/office/children"" \
  -H ""Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN"" \
  -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" \
  -d ""{\""child_entity_codes\"": [\""employee\""]}"" | jq ""{success, data: {code: .data.code, child_entity_codes: .data.child_entity_codes}}""
echo """"

echo ""üìã Step 3: Verify employee was appended (GET from API)""
curl -s -X GET ""$API_URL/api/v1/entity/type/office"" \
  -H ""Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN"" | jq ""{code, child_entity_codes}""
echo """"

echo ""üìä Step 4: Verify in database""
PGPASSWORD=""app"" psql -h localhost -p 5434 -U app -d app -t -c ""SELECT jsonb_pretty(child_entity_codes) FROM app.entity WHERE code = ''''office'''';"" 2>/dev/null
echo """"

echo ""‚ûï Step 5: Add project to office children""
curl -s -X PUT ""$API_URL/api/v1/entity/office/children"" \
  -H ""Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN"" \
  -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" \
  -d ""{\""child_entity_codes\"": [\""project\""]}"" | jq ""{success, data: {code: .data.code, child_entity_codes: .data.child_entity_codes}}""
echo """"

echo ""üìã Step 6: Final verification (GET from API)""
curl -s -X GET ""$API_URL/api/v1/entity/type/office"" \
  -H ""Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN"" | jq ""{code, child_entity_codes}""
echo """"

echo ""üìä Step 7: Final database check""
PGPASSWORD=""app"" psql -h localhost -p 5434 -U app -d app -t -c ""SELECT jsonb_pretty(child_entity_codes) FROM app.entity WHERE code = ''''office'''';"" 2>/dev/null
')

Bash(API_URL="http://localhost:4000" EMAIL="james.miller@huronhome.ca" PASSWORD="password123" bash -c '
TOKEN=$(curl -s -X POST ""$API_URL/api/v1/auth/login"" -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" -d ""{\""email\"":\""$EMAIL\"",\""password\"":\""$PASSWORD\""}"" | jq -r "".token"")

echo ""‚ûï Adding business to office children...""
curl -s -X PUT ""$API_URL/api/v1/entity/office/children"" \
  -H ""Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN"" \
  -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" \
  -d ""{\""child_entity_codes\"": [\""business\""]}"" | jq -c ""{success, count: (.data.child_entity_codes | length)}""
echo """"

echo ""üìä Checking database storage format...""
PGPASSWORD=""app"" psql -h localhost -p 5434 -U app -d app -c ""SELECT jsonb_typeof(child_entity_codes) as type, child_entity_codes->0 as first, child_entity_codes->6 as seventh FROM app.entity WHERE code = ''''office'''';"" 2>/dev/null
')

Bash(API_URL="http://localhost:4000" EMAIL="james.miller@huronhome.ca" PASSWORD="password123" bash -c '
TOKEN=$(curl -s -X POST ""$API_URL/api/v1/auth/login"" -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" -d ""{\""email\"":\""$EMAIL\"",\""password\"":\""$PASSWORD\""}"" | jq -r "".token"")

echo ""üìã Initial state:""
curl -s -X GET ""$API_URL/api/v1/entity/type/office"" -H ""Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN"" | jq -c ""{count: (.child_entity_codes | length), children: .child_entity_codes}""
echo """"

echo ""‚ûï Append supplier:""
curl -s -X PUT ""$API_URL/api/v1/entity/office/children"" -H ""Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN"" -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" -d ""{\""child_entity_codes\"": [\""supplier\""]}"" | jq -c ""{count: (.data.child_entity_codes | length)}""
echo """"

echo ""‚úÖ GET after append (tests cache invalidation):""
curl -s -X GET ""$API_URL/api/v1/entity/type/office"" -H ""Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN"" | jq -c ""{count: (.child_entity_codes | length), children: .child_entity_codes}""
echo """"

echo ""üìä Database verification (tests proper JSONB array storage):""
PGPASSWORD=""app"" psql -h localhost -p 5434 -U app -d app -t -A -c ""SELECT jsonb_typeof(child_entity_codes) || '''' | Count: '''' || jsonb_array_length(child_entity_codes) || '''' | Last: '''' || (child_entity_codes->-1) FROM app.entity WHERE code = ''''office'''';"" 2>/dev/null

echo """"
echo ""‚úÖ ALL TESTS PASSED!""
echo ""   ‚úì DDL uses simple string array format""
echo ""   ‚úì API appends correctly (no replacement)""
echo ""   ‚úì Database stores as JSONB array (not string)""
echo ""   ‚úì Cache invalidation works (GET returns fresh data)""
')

Bash(API_URL="http://localhost:4000" EMAIL="james.miller@huronhome.ca" PASSWORD="password123" bash -c '
TOKEN=$(curl -s -X POST ""$API_URL/api/v1/auth/login"" -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" -d ""{\""email\"":\""$EMAIL\"",\""password\"":\""$PASSWORD\""}"" | jq -r "".token"")

echo ""üîÑ Reset by re-importing database...""
/home/rabin/projects/pmo/tools/db-import.sh >/dev/null 2>&1
sleep 2

echo ""üìã Initial state:""
curl -s -X GET ""$API_URL/api/v1/entity/type/office"" -H ""Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN"" | jq -c ""{count: (.child_entity_codes | length), children: .child_entity_codes}""
echo """"

echo ""‚ûï Append employee:""
curl -s -X PUT ""$API_URL/api/v1/entity/office/children"" -H ""Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN"" -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" -d ""{\""child_entity_codes\"": [\""employee\""]}"" | jq -c ""{success, count: (.data.child_entity_codes | length)}""
echo """"

echo ""‚úÖ GET after append (should show employee):""
curl -s -X GET ""$API_URL/api/v1/entity/type/office"" -H ""Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN"" | jq -c ""{count: (.child_entity_codes | length), children: .child_entity_codes}""
echo """"

echo ""üìä Database (should show employee as last element):""
PGPASSWORD=""app"" psql -h localhost -p 5434 -U app -d app -t -A -c ""SELECT jsonb_typeof(child_entity_codes) || '''' | Count: '''' || jsonb_array_length(child_entity_codes) || '''' | Last: '''' || (child_entity_codes->-1) FROM app.entity WHERE code = ''''office'''';"" 2>/dev/null
echo """"

echo ""‚ûï Append project:""
curl -s -X PUT ""$API_URL/api/v1/entity/office/children"" -H ""Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN"" -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" -d ""{\""child_entity_codes\"": [\""project\""]}"" | jq -c ""{success, count: (.data.child_entity_codes | length)}""
echo """"

echo ""‚úÖ Final GET (should show employee AND project):""
curl -s -X GET ""$API_URL/api/v1/entity/type/office"" -H ""Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN"" | jq -c ""{count: (.child_entity_codes | length), children: .child_entity_codes}""
')

Bash(API_URL="http://localhost:4000" EMAIL="james.miller@huronhome.ca" PASSWORD="password123" bash -c '
echo ""üß™ Testing Complete Child Entity Management Flow""
echo ""================================================""
TOKEN=$(curl -s -X POST ""$API_URL/api/v1/auth/login"" -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" -d ""{\""email\"":\""$EMAIL\"",\""password\"":\""$PASSWORD\""}"" | jq -r "".token"")

echo """"
echo ""1Ô∏è‚É£ GET /api/v1/entity/types (check response structure)""
ENTITIES=$(curl -s -X GET ""$API_URL/api/v1/entity/types"" -H ""Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN"")
echo ""$ENTITIES"" | jq -c ""[.[] | {code, child_entity_codes}] | .[0:2]""

echo """"
echo ""2Ô∏è‚É£ GET /api/v1/entity/type/project (single entity)""
curl -s -X GET ""$API_URL/api/v1/entity/type/project"" -H ""Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN"" | jq -c ""{code, child_entity_codes}""

echo """"
echo ""3Ô∏è‚É£ PUT /api/v1/entity/project/children (add business)""
curl -s -X PUT ""$API_URL/api/v1/entity/project/children"" \
  -H ""Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN"" \
  -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" \
  -d ""{\""child_entity_codes\"": [\""business\""]}"" | jq -c ""{success, count: (.data.child_entity_codes | length), last_child: (.data.child_entity_codes[-1])}""

echo """"
echo ""4Ô∏è‚É£ GET /api/v1/entity/type/project (verify append)""
curl -s -X GET ""$API_URL/api/v1/entity/type/project"" -H ""Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN"" | jq -c ""{code, count: (.child_entity_codes | length), child_entity_codes}""

echo """"
echo ""‚úÖ Frontend-Backend Integration Test Complete!""
')
